name: Spacewalk Arcade
description:
Your space shuttle has no fuel left and you got caught in an asteroid field.

Your only way of dodging the asteroids is to extend and shorten your lifeline.

Rotate with A and D.

Change lifeline length with Left Mouse click and Right Mouse click.

[[Note that the Asteroids are allowed to touch the lifeline]]

Credit:

Music from patrickdearteaga.com

Art made by myself. Feel free to use it in your projects with credit. [Link]
